github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Follow the Conventional Commits specification. The commit message must start with one of the types defined in .github/conventional-commit-types.json (feat, fix, docs, chore, refactor, style, revert, perf, test, ci, build, deps, breaking, security, hotfix, deprecate, release, wip), optionally followed by a scope in parentheses. Format: <type>(<optional scope>): <short description>. Use the imperative mood, lowercase, no trailing period.

github.copilot.chat.pullRequestDescripti.text: The PR title must follow the Conventional Commits specification using one of the types defined in .github/conventional-commit-types.json (feat, fix, docs, chore, refactor, style, revert, perf, test, ci, build, deps, breaking, security, hotfix, deprecate, release, wip), optionally followed by a scope in parentheses. Format: <type>(<optional scope>): <short description>. Use the imperative mood, lowercase, no trailing period. The title must pass the regex enforced by the CI workflow: ^(type)(\(.+\))?!?: .+
